name: Bitbucket code references
overview: Use our open-source utility to track references to flags in your code, using Bitbucket Pipes.
description: Use our open-source utility to track references to flags in your code, using Bitbucket Pipes.
details: Bitbucket is Git code management that gives teams one place to plan projects, collaborate on code, test, and deploy. Use our open-source utility to track references to flags in your code, using Bitbucket Pipes.
author: LaunchDarkly
